mapper.select: /****** [ aps.planResult.planIdPeggingSelect ] ******/ SELECT B1.* , B1.PLAN_ID AS CODE_CD , B1.PLAN_ID AS CODE_NM , (SELECT YYYYMMDD FROM TB_MST_CALENDAR WHERE YEARWEEK = B1.APS_START_WEEK AND DAY_NM = 'SUN') AS START_DAY , (SELECT YYYYMMDD FROM TB_MST_CALENDAR WHERE YEARWEEK = B1.APS_END_WEEK AND DAY_NM = 'SAT') AS END_DAY , (SELECT YYYYMMDD FROM TB_MST_CALENDAR WHERE YEARWEEK = B1.APS_CLOSE_WEEK AND DAY_NM = 'SAT') AS CLOSE_DAY FROM ( SELECT PLAN_ID , APS_START_WEEK , (SELECT YEARWEEK FROM TB_MST_CALENDAR WHERE YYYYMMDD = (SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, DATEADD(DAY, 14, YYYYMMDD), 112) AS YYYYMMDD FROM TB_MST_CALENDAR WHERE YEARWEEK = A1.APS_START_WEEK AND DAY_NM = 'SUN')) AS APS_END_WEEK , APS_END_WEEK AS APS_CLOSE_WEEK FROM TB_MST_PLAN_VERSION A1 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND PLAN_TYPE_CD = 'MP' ) B1 ORDER BY B1.APS_START_WEEK DESC

/****** [ aps.planResult.planPeggingListSelect ] ******/ SELECT CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC6.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC6.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC6.CODE_NM END AS PROD_PART_NM , HAPP.VERSION_ID AS VERSION_ID_NM , HAPP.DEMAND_ID AS DEMAND_ID2_NM #if($_parameter.planTypeCd == "MP") , HAD.SP_WEEK AS SP_WEEK_NM , HAD.SP_QTY AS PROD_SP_QTY_NM #elseif($_parameter.planTypeCd == "FP") , HAD.PLAN_WEEK AS SP_WEEK_NM , HAD.PLAN_QTY AS PROD_SP_QTY_NM #end , CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC2.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC2.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC2.CODE_NM END APS_DEMAND_TYPE_NM , HAPP.PRIORITY AS AP_PRIORITY_NM , HAPP.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD_NM , MI.ITEM_NM AS ITEM_NM_NM , MI.ITEM_GROUP_CD AS ITEM_GROUP_CD_NM
---- 201229 이큰산 변경 --, (CASE WHEN ISNULL(HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO, '') = '' THEN MIP.ROUTING_ID ELSE MRO.ROUTING_ID END) AS ROUTING_ID_NM , (CASE WHEN ISNULL(HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO, '') = '' THEN MRO.ROUTING_ID ELSE MRO.ROUTING_ID END) AS ROUTING_ID_NM ----------------------
, HAPP.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID_NM
---- 201229 이큰산 변경 , (CASE WHEN ISNULL(HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO , '') = '' THEN HAPP.ROUTING_NO ELSE MRO.ROUTING_NO END) AS ROUTING_NO_NM ----------------------
, CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC3.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC3.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC3.CODE_NM END PROCUR_TYPE_NM , HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO AS PROD_ORDER_NO_PE_NM , HAPP.PARENT_PROD_ORDER_NO AS PARENT_PROD_ORDER_NO_PE_NM , CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC7.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC7.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC7.CODE_NM END JOB_TYPE_NM , HAPP.OPERATION_NO AS OPERATION_NO_NM , CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC1.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC1.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC1.CODE_NM END JOB_NM_NM , HAPP.MAT_ITEM_CD AS MAT_ITEM_CD_NM , ROUND(HAPP.JC_TIME / 3600.0, 2) AS JC_TIME_NM , HAPP.PRE_COMPLETION_DTTM AS PRE_COMPLETION_DTTM_NM , CASE WHEN HAPP.STATUS = 'SKIP' THEN NULL ELSE HAPP.START_DTTM END START_DTTM_NM , CASE WHEN HAPP.STATUS = 'SKIP' THEN NULL ELSE HAPP.END_DTTM END END_DTTM_NM , HAPP.COMPLETION_DTTM AS COMPLETION_DTTM_NM , ROUND(DATEDIFF(MI, HAPP.PRE_COMPLETION_DTTM, HAPP.START_DTTM) / 60.0 / 24.0, 1) AS WAIT_DAYS_NM , HAPP.STATUS AS STATUS_NM , HAPP.QTY AS PROD_QTY_NM , MWC.WC_NM AS WC_NM_PE_NM , ISNULL(MR.RESOURCE_NM, HAPP.RESOURCE_CD) AS RESOURCE_NM_NM , CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC8.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC8.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC8.CODE_NM END WORKER_GROUP_NM , CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC4.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC4.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC4.CODE_NM END CAMPUS_CD_NM , CASE WHEN HAPP.CAMPUS_DISTRIBUTION = 'Y' THEN HAPP.START_DTTM END AS CAMPUS_DISTRIBUTION_NM , MWC.WC_MGR_NM AS WC_MGR_NM , MIP.FIXED_MRP_QTY AS FIXED_MRP_QTY_NM , CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC5.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC5.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC5.CODE_NM END PROD_GROUP_DET_NM , ROUND(ISNULL(MRO.WAIT_TIME, ISNULL(MFR.WAIT_TIME, 0)) / 3600.0, 2) AS WAIT_TIME_NM , ROUND((ISNULL(MRO.FIRST_TIME, ISNULL(MFR.FIRST_TIME, 0)) + ISNULL(MRO.RUN_TIME, ISNULL(MFR.RUN_TIME, 0)) + ISNULL(MRO.AFTER_TIME, ISNULL(MFR.AFTER_TIME, 0))) / 3600.0, 2) AS WORK_TIME_NM , ROUND(ISNULL(MRO.MOVE_TIME, ISNULL(MFR.MOVE_TIME, 0)) / 3600.0, 2) AS MOVE_TIME_NM , CASE WHEN HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO IS NULL THEN MRO.MAIN_WORKER ELSE DPOD.MAIN_WORKER END AS MAIN_WORKER_NM , CASE WHEN HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO IS NULL THEN MRO.LOT_SIZE ELSE DPOD.LOT_SIZE END AS LOT_SIZE_NM , MI.KEY_MAT_YN AS KEY_MAT_YN_NM , MI.KEY_MAT_LT AS KEY_MAT_LT_NM , MR.OVEN_AREA AS OVEN_AREA_NM , MR.RESOURCE_EFF_RATE AS RESOURCE_EFF_RATE_NM , HAPP.SEMI_ITEM_CD , HAPP.SEMI_ITEM_CD AS SEMI_ITEM_CD_NM , MI.SPEC AS SPEC_NM , MRO.OUT_LOT_SIZE , MRO.OUT_LOT_SIZE AS OUT_LOT_SIZE_NM , HAPP.RESOURCE_PRIORITY , HAPP.RESOURCE_PRIORITY AS RESOURCE_PRIORITY_NM , HAPP.LOT_PROD_ORDER_NO AS LOT_PROD_ORDER_NO_NM , CASE WHEN MC9.CODE_CD IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS CLEANING_YN_NM , HAD.ADJ_PRIORITY AS ADJ_PRIORITY2_NM #if($_parameter.planTypeCd == "MP") , HADWA.WIP_PRIORITY AS WIP_PRIORITY_NM #else , NULL AS WIP_PRIORITY_NM #end , ROUND(ISNULL(MRO.OFFSET_TIME, 0) / 3600.0, 2) AS OFFSET_TIME , ROUND(ISNULL(MRO.OFFSET_TIME, 0) / 3600.0, 2) AS OFFSET_TIME_NM , CASE WHEN HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO IS NULL THEN MRO.TOTAL_WORKER ELSE DPOD.TOTAL_WORKER END AS TOTAL_WORKER , CASE WHEN HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO IS NULL THEN MRO.TOTAL_WORKER ELSE DPOD.TOTAL_WORKER END AS TOTAL_WORKER_NM FROM TB_HIS_APS_PLAN_PEGGING HAPP WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_ITEM MI WITH(NOLOCK) ON MI.COMPANY_CD = HAPP.COMPANY_CD AND MI.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND MI.ITEM_CD = HAPP.ITEM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_ITEM_PLANT MIP WITH(NOLOCK) ON MIP.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MIP.BU_CD = MI.BU_CD AND MIP.PLANT_CD = 'WF01' AND MIP.ITEM_CD = MI.ITEM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_WORK_CENTER MWC WITH(NOLOCK) ON MWC.COMPANY_CD = HAPP.COMPANY_CD AND MWC.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND MWC.WC_CD = HAPP.WC_CD AND MWC.PLANT_CD = 'WF01' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_RESOURCE MR WITH(NOLOCK) ON MR.COMPANY_CD = HAPP.COMPANY_CD AND MR.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND MR.RESOURCE_CD = HAPP.RESOURCE_CD AND MR.PLANT_CD = 'WF01'
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_FQC_ROUTING MFR WITH(NOLOCK) ON MFR.COMPANY_CD = HAPP.COMPANY_CD AND MFR.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND MFR.ITEM_CD = HAPP.ITEM_CD AND MFR.OPERATION_NO = HAPP.OPERATION_NO AND MFR.USE_FLAG = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DYN_PROD_ORDER_DTL DPOD WITH(NOLOCK) ON DPOD.COMPANY_CD = HAPP.COMPANY_CD AND DPOD.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND DPOD.PROD_ORDER_NO = HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO AND DPOD.OPERATION_NO = HAPP.OPERATION_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DYN_PROD_ORDER_HDR DPOH WITH(NOLOCK) ON DPOH.COMPANY_CD = HAPP.COMPANY_CD AND DPOH.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND DPOH.PROD_ORDER_NO = HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_ROUTING MRO WITH(NOLOCK) ON MRO.COMPANY_CD = HAPP.COMPANY_CD AND MRO.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND MRO.PLANT_CD = 'WF01' AND MRO.ITEM_CD = HAPP.ITEM_CD AND MRO.ROUTING_NO = (CASE WHEN ISNULL(HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO, '') = '' THEN HAPP.ROUTING_NO ELSE DPOH.ROUTING_NO END) AND MRO.OPERATION_NO = HAPP.OPERATION_NO #if($_parameter.planTypeCd == "MP") LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_HIS_APS_DEMAND HAD WITH(NOLOCK) #elseif($_parameter.planTypeCd == "FP") LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_HIS_APS_DEMAND_DAILY HAD WITH(NOLOCK) #end ON HAD.PLAN_ID = HAPP.PLAN_ID AND HAD.COMPANY_CD = HAPP.COMPANY_CD AND HAD.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND HAD.PROD_PART = HAPP.PROD_PART AND HAD.DEMAND_ID = HAPP.DEMAND_ID #if($_parameter.planTypeCd == "MP") AND HAD.VERSION_TYPE_CD = @{versionTypeCd} LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT HADWA.PLAN_ID , HADWA.COMPANY_CD , HADWA.BU_CD , HADWA.PROD_PART , HADWA.PROD_ORDER_NO , MIN(HADWA.WIP_PRIORITY) AS WIP_PRIORITY FROM TB_HIS_APS_DEMAND_WIP_ALLOC HADWA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE HADWA.PLAN_ID = @{planId} AND HADWA.COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND HADWA.BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND HADWA.PROD_PART = @{prodPart} AND HADWA.VERSION_TYPE_CD = @{versionTypeCd} GROUP BY HADWA.PLAN_ID, HADWA.COMPANY_CD, HADWA.BU_CD, HADWA.PROD_PART, HADWA.PROD_ORDER_NO ) HADWA ON HADWA.PLAN_ID = HAPP.PLAN_ID AND HADWA.COMPANY_CD = HAPP.COMPANY_CD AND HADWA.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND HADWA.PROD_PART = HAPP.PROD_PART AND HADWA.PROD_ORDER_NO = HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO #end LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BU_CD , GROUP_CD , CODE_CD , CODE_NM , CODE_NM_KR , CODE_NM_CN , USE_FLAG , ATTB_5_CD , ATTB_6_CD , ATTB_7_CD , ATTB_8_CD FROM TB_MST_CODE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE GROUP_CD = 'ROUTE_CD' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT BU_CD , GROUP_CD , CODE_CD , CODE_NM , CODE_NM_KR , CODE_NM_CN , USE_FLAG , ATTB_5_CD , ATTB_6_CD , ATTB_7_CD , ATTB_8_CD FROM TB_MST_CODE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE GROUP_CD = 'FQC_ROUTE_CD' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) MC1 ON MC1.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND MC1.CODE_CD = HAPP.JOB_CD AND MC1.USE_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_ITEM_PROD_GROUP MIPG WITH(NOLOCK) ON MIPG.COMPANY_CD = HAPP.COMPANY_CD AND MIPG.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND MIPG.ITEM_CD = HAPP.ITEM_CD AND MIPG.DEL_FLAG = 'N' #if($_parameter.prodPart == "TEL") AND MIPG.PROD_GROUP = MC1.ATTB_5_CD #elseif($_parameter.prodPart == "LAM") AND MIPG.PROD_GROUP = MC1.ATTB_6_CD #elseif($_parameter.prodPart == "DIFFUSION") AND MIPG.PROD_GROUP = MC1.ATTB_7_CD #elseif($_parameter.prodPart == "MATERIAL") AND MIPG.PROD_GROUP = MC1.ATTB_8_CD #end LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC2.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND MC2.GROUP_CD = 'APS_DEMAND_TYPE' AND MC2.CODE_CD = HAPP.APS_DEMAND_TYPE AND MC2.USE_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC3 WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC3.BU_CD = 'ALL' AND MC3.GROUP_CD = 'PROCUR_TYPE' AND MC3.CODE_CD = MIP.PROCUR_TYPE AND MC3.USE_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC4 WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC4.BU_CD = MIP.BU_CD AND MC4.GROUP_CD = 'CAMPUS_CD' AND MC4.CODE_CD = HAPP.CAMPUS_CD AND MC4.USE_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC5 WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC5.BU_CD = MIP.BU_CD AND MC5.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_ITEM_GROUP_LIST' AND MC5.CODE_CD = MIPG.PROD_GROUP_DET AND MC5.USE_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC6 WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC6.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND MC6.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_PART' AND MC6.CODE_CD = HAPP.PROD_PART AND MC6.USE_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC7 WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC7.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND MC7.GROUP_CD = 'ROUTE_TYPE_CD' AND MC7.CODE_CD = HAPP.JOB_TYPE AND MC7.USE_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC8 WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC8.BU_CD = HAPP.BU_CD AND MC8.GROUP_CD = 'WORKER_GROUP' AND MC8.CODE_CD = HAPP.WORKER_GROUP AND MC8.USE_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC9 WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC9.BU_CD = MIP.BU_CD AND MC9.GROUP_CD = 'CL_SL_CD' AND MC9.CODE_CD = MIP.RCPT_SL_CD AND MC9.USE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE HAPP.PLAN_ID = @{planId} AND HAPP.VERSION_ID = @{planVersion} AND HAPP.COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND HAPP.BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND HAPP.PROD_PART = @{prodPart} AND CONVERT(NVARCHAR, HAPP.START_DTTM, 112) BETWEEN @{fromCal} AND @{toCal} #if($_parameter.priority and $_parameter.priority != "") AND HAPP.PRIORITY = @{priority} #end #if($_parameter.demandId and $_parameter.demandId != "") AND HAPP.DEMAND_ID = @{demandId} #end #if($_parameter.prodOrderNo and $_parameter.prodOrderNo != "") AND HAPP.PROD_ORDER_NO IN ('$_parameter.prodOrderNo.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.jobCd and $_parameter.jobCd != "") AND ( CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC1.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN MC1.CODE_NM_CN ELSE MC1.CODE_NM END LIKE '%'+@{jobCd}+'%' ) #end #if($_parameter.itemGroup and $_parameter.itemGroup != "") AND MI.ITEM_GROUP_CD IN ('$_parameter.itemGroup.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.route and $_parameter.route != "") AND MIP.ROUTING_ID IN ('$_parameter.route.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.item_cd and $_parameter.item_cd != "") AND MI.ITEM_CD IN ('$_parameter.item_cd.replace(",","','")') #elseif($_parameter.item_nm and $_parameter.item_nm != "") AND (MI.ITEM_CD LIKE '%'+@{item_nm}+'%' OR MI.ITEM_NM LIKE '%'+@{item_nm}+'%') #end ORDER BY MC6.CODE_NM, HAPP.VERSION_ID, HAPP.DEMAND_ID, CONVERT(NUMERIC, HAPP.ORDER_ID), HAPP.ITEM_CD, CONVERT(NUMERIC, HAPP.OPERATION_NO), START_DTTM DESC
